ValidationRule.description: Classification field can only be edited if Stage is Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(Classification__c),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, 'Closed Won')),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(OPCOverride__c , 'Yes')),
NOT( OR(ISCHANGED(Contract_Start_Date__c), ISCHANGED(Contract_End_Date__c)) ),
OR( $Profile.Name = 'Business Enablement', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Admin', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'SSSW - Service Agent', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Contracts CME', $Profile.Name = 'Enterprise Onboarding' ),
OR( (AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Classification__c), 'Renewal'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Classification__c, 'Growth')) )), (AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Classification__c), 'Growth'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Classification__c, 'Renewal')) ))
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only change Classification to Growth when the Opportunity is open.
